channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2025030862
item.description:
Report X-2025030862

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-18
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During customs inspection at the PDXR location a fiberboard box containing a number of bottles filled with isopropyl alcohol UN1219 was discovered. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG markings or paperwork required for transport. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and is being held at the location for the FAA.

item.title: Report X-2025030430
item.description:
Report X-2025030430

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO LEAKING PACKAGE IN UNLOAD. UPON INSPECTING LEAKING PACKAGE, NOTICED PRODUCT WAS 99% ISOPROPYNAL ALCOHOL, WITH A 53F FLASH POINT. CHECKED SDS AND INITIATED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROTOCOL.

item.title: Report X-2025030429
item.description:
Report X-2025030429

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: BACKUP RESPONDER WHO WAS WORKING AT SMALL TENDER FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. HE CONTAINED IT IN A SPILL TRAY AND BROUGHT IT TO THE PSC. PRIMARY RESPONDER LOOKED UP THE SDS FOR THE PRODUCT. SECTION 14 SHOWED THAT IT WAS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. THE HMSC WAS CALLED TO VERIFY. THEY CONFIRMED AND THE PROCESS BEGAN.

item.title: Report X-2025030418
item.description:
Report X-2025030418

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-20
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE. FOUND A BOX WITH 82 PERFUME BOTTLES AND 2 HAD SHATTERED. PERFUMERY PRODUCTS - (82) BOTTLES OF PERFUME UNDER 8 OUNCES. DOES NOT MEET 173.150(G) DUE TO CONTAINING A TOTAL OF 211.4 OUNCES IN THE BOX. ALL PERFUMERIES CONTAIN ALCOHOL AND HAVE FLAMMABLE PICTOGRAM; SDS' NOT RECEIVED BY SHIPPER OR MANUFACTURER.
